static.__comment: static entries will be sent to the TTS engine directly to generate audio. You can assign the synthesize template via the ttsTemplate key. It is default by default.
static.text: Hi there, how is it going?

genai.__comment: You can use ttsTemplate and genAiTemplate to fine tune the behavior.
genai.text: Tell something inspiring to a 2 years old boy.
Tell a fun fact about the world.
Tell a fun fact about the dinosaurs.
Tell a fun fact about the universe or the planets.
Give a simple math exercise for an 8 years old. Do not reveal the solution!
